result.title: CodeForces Status Notifier
result.content:
Hello everyone!

When you got Accepted in a problem you should celebrate, lets make our android phones celebrate with us :-).

Check out this new Android App : CodeForces Status Notifier

This application makes extensive use of the Codeforces API which allows you to do the following things

This app support you by sending a notification for each accepted submission with your favorite song , and also send notification for unsuccessful submission to motivate you by a song you choose.

lets have fun by our submissions.
